title: Mancato invio da Thunderbird indirizzo info@..... a indirizzi gmail
content:
Buongiorno, da diverse settimane ogni volta che mando una mail dal mio indirizzo info@......com (appoggiato a Thunderbird) ad un indirizzo gmail, mi torna indietro la mail con il seguente errore:


This message was created automatically by mail delivery software.

A message that you sent could not be delivered to one or more of its recipients. This is a permanent error. The following address(es) failed: 

 mg.imballaggi@gmail.com    host gmail-smtp-in.l.google.com [108.177.127.27]    SMTP error from remote mail server after end of data:    550-5.7.26 This mail is unauthenticated, which poses a security risk to the    550-5.7.26 sender and Gmail users, and has been blocked. The sender must    550-5.7.26 authenticate with at least one of SPF or DKIM. For this message,    550-5.7.26 DKIM checks did not pass and SPF check for [paolazziambiente.com]    550-5.7.26 did not pass with ip: [185.81.2.212]. The sender should visit    550-5.7.26  https://support.google.com/mail/answer/81126#authentication for    550 5.7.26 instructions on setting up authentication. qm13-20020a170907674d00b009334769e7ebsi105646ejc.790 - gsmtp

Questa cosa mi succede solo con indirizzi di invio aventi dominio gmail. Come posso fare?

Grazie
creator: info9017

title: Saved incomplete attachments from bigger emails
content:
Hello, I've just received an email with two attachments: a 28kB PNG and a 18MB ZIP. I can double-click and show the image normally, but when I do the same on the ZIP, I get a "is not an archive" error. If I try to save the attachments on the desktop, the PNG gets saved normally, while the ZIP shows up as a 27-bytes file.

I'm using Thunderbird 102.9.0 (64-bit) on Linux. If it's relevant, under "Synchronization & storage -> Disk space" I have "Syncronize all messages locally regardless of age".

Thanks for your help!

title: Thunderbird: Wrong Info in Original Message Header
content: When I reply (or reply all) to a message in Thunderbird, the Original Message header information (ie subject, from, date) is always the same, relating to a message of 5 years ago. Curiously, when I forward a message, the Original Message header information is correct.

title: Issue with Thunderbird: Account seems blocked for spam reasons
content:
My account in Thunderbird seems blocked for spam reasons. It does not let me sens email to some contacts. It seems someone/something probably entered (malware?) and my account is declared as spam-sender. I don't exactly know. The message that pops when denies me to send an email is (spannish): "Falló el envío del mensaje. Ha ocurrido un error al enviar el mensaje. El servidor de correo respondió: Cuenta bloqueada por envio de Spam. Entre en contacto con su proveedor de Hosting para desbloqueo. Verifique el destinatario "support-eu@mail.support.microsoft.com" y vuelva a intentarlo."

I need to unlock my account and also to know what exactly happened. Thank you in advance!

title: Lost ability to "Send" messages; lost the "Sent" folder
content:
I use Thunderbird 102.9.1 (32-bit). On afternoon of March 30, 2023, I lost the ability to "Send" messages. When I hit "send", the small box comes up, the blue bar goes all the way across the screen...and, freezes there. I have conferred with my source ISP at "charter.net" (company name is Spectrum) in Michigan (we are Snowbirds) and with the local ISP carrier here in Port Charlotte, FL, "Comcast". Neither ISP has been able to get my laptop back up with sending. The Comcast techs did a test and it showed that I do not have IPv6 connectivity but had no recommendations on a fix for that.

My firewall is Windows Security that comes with Windows 10 Pro; my Anti-Virus software is Malwarebytes Premium 4.5.25; Operating System is Windows 10 Pro v. 22H2; and, my Email Client is Thunderbird 102.9.1 (32-bit). Included is a screenshot of my Thunderbird SMTP settings.

Can you help me? Jon LaSalle [removed phone# from public forum] in Port Charlotte, FL.
creator: mbtc2

title: Timezones update for America/Mexico
content:
Last year the government in Mexico eliminated the daylight saving time so different providers had to update their timezones so match this change.

You can find more information here: https://newsus.cgtn.com/news/2022-11-13/Mexico-eliminates-daylight-saving-time-1eUHUADJneU/index.html

Different service providers had to make an update of the tzdata's to avoid this issues.

I believe an update is still required in Thunberbird to correct this since I had to change my current timezone from America/Mexico_City to America/Guatemala to avoid issues in the meetings times because they actually moved an hour.
creator: galtamirano

title: No paso de "Comprobando la contraseña"
content:
Hola

Descargue ayer la última versión de Thunderbird.

Al introducir correos de mi empresa, no pasa de "comprobando la contraseña...".

Son correos que tengo funcionando en Thunderbird en mi ordenador portátil sin problema y he borrado y vuelto a poner muchas veces.

He comprobado que todos los datos sean correctos (Nombre, mail y Pass). Me he puesto en contacto con el servidor de mis correos y me detalla que no tienen ninguna incidencia.

He probado ponerlos con todas las configuraciones posibles (POP3, IMAP...).

He probado en otros 3 ordenadores que ya tienen thunderbird funcionando con cuentas del mismo servidor y la misma empresa desde hace años y nada tamapoco.

He probado con más de 10 cuentas diferentes de la empresa sin resultado, las 10 cuentas las tengo en el portátil funcionando con thunderbird desde hace años sin problemas.

Al probar con un Gmail, si que funciona Thunderbird.

Agradecería algo de ayuda e información.

Saludos, Aaron
creator: Aarontrabaja

title: VISUALIZAR ADJUNTOS ANTES DE ENVIAR
content:
[https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/que.../1356870]

Buenas, estuve teniendo el mismo problema que el anterior tema, como estaba cerrado abri uno nuevo. Lo hago porque lo pude resolver, se que archivo es el que me da pero no se cual es el problema.

Instale Thunderbirds en un pc nueva, lleve la carpeta del perfil a la nueva instalacion. como me daba error decidi copiar un archivo del perfil anterior al nuevo, abrir thunderbirds y probar visualisar adjunto pdf antes de enviar. Hice este proceso repetidas veces con los archivos hasta que copie "handlers.json" y me dio el error.

Probe si dejado el archivo anterior me funcionaba y todo perfecto.

Dejo esto por si alguno tiene el mismo problema, puede ir por ahi.

Adjunto foto del error Espero que le pueda servir a alguien .

Saludos
creator: fedefedex

title: Error When Using Local Folders in Dropbox
content:
I have been storing my Thunderbird local folders in Dropbox for several months. Everything was working fine where I could access my local folders from multiple machines, all Windows machines. About a week ago, I am geting an error message when I try to add an emailk to a local folder. I get the message: messagew there, no problem There is not enough disk space to download new messages. Try deleting old mail, emptying the Trash folder, and compacting your mail folders, and then try again.

I know there is pleany of space both in my Dropbox and on my hard drive. I can create another local folder and store the message there, no problem. I have done all the recommended steps: empty trash, compacting folders, etc.

Has anyone come across this issue and, if so, what is the work around?

Thanks in advance, Keith Johnson

title: Thunderbird not respecting Mexico standard time 2023 (Mexico not using DST)
content:
In our company the Thunderbird calendar meeting invitations are off by an hour.

Refer to screenshots where it shows the current time in Windows is 7pm but the time in Thunderbird is 8pm.

Condition found: Thunderbird time is 8pm. In the screenshot with the calendar view you can see in the bottom right hand corner Windows indicates it's 7pm but the red time indicator in the Thunderbird calendar view is 8pm.

Desired condition: Thunderbird time should match Windows time of 7pm.

Please note that: Mexico observed summertime daylight saving time starting in 1996. In late 2022, the nation's clocks "fell back" for the last time, in restoration of permanent standard time. [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dayligh.../Daylight_saving_time]

Things tried: Installed the latest Thunderbird on fresh Windows machine. Googled: [Search]

Does anyone see what I might be doing wrong?
creator: jgleba
